# Machine Learning

## [An Introduction to Statistical Learning](https://www.statlearning.com/)

This is the book website for the book ***An Introduction to Statistical Learning with Applications in R*** by *Gareth James, Daniela Witten, Trevor Hastie and Robert Tibshirani*. The PDF version of the book could be downloaded and view online from this website. Further, data and other supporting materials such as Jupyter Notebook and R Markdown files are available.

Data for the book could also be found in my [GitHub site](https://github.com/stevenkhwun/Online-resources/tree/main/ISLR).



# Python

## [Python for Data Analysis](https://wesmckinney.com/book/)

This is the book website for the book ***Python for Data Analysis: Data Wrangling with pandas, NumPy, and Jupyter*** 3rd Edition by *Wes McKinney*. The book could be view online from this site.
